item.title: Equivalent first order optimality conditions over Stiefel manifold
item.description: This post is a short summary of equivalent first order optimality conditions collected from several papers for the smooth optimization problem over Stiefel manifold. item.title: Projection onto Stiefel manifold
item.description: In this post, we will give some explicit formulas of the projection of a matrix \( Y \in \mathbb{R}^{n \times p} \) onto Stiefel manifold \( \St(p, n) \). Moreover, the Lipschitz continuity of the projection will be discussed.

item.title: Ignore certain files in ivy
item.description: latex and latexmk generate some auxiliary files while compiling, which will be edited rarely. So it might be convenient to ignore them when switching buffers (ivy-switch-buffer) or finding files (counsel-find-file), which can be achieved by setting ivy-ignore-buffers and counsel-find-file-ignore-regexp, respectively.
